trans-unit.source: If you want to force the use of a SES configuration set you can set the option below. This is useful when you want to do more detailed tracking of your emails such as opens and clicks. You can see more details at: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/ses/latest/DeveloperGuide/using-configuration-sets.html.
trans-unit.target: Si desea forzar el uso de un conjunto de configuración de SES, puede establecer la siguiente opción. Esto es útil cuando desea realizar un seguimiento más detallado de sus correos electrónicos, como aperturas y clics. Puede ver más detalles en: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/ses/latest/DeveloperGuide/using-configuration-sets.html .

trans-unit.source: Next, ensure that your Amazon Web Services (AWS) API credentials are setup, or that you are running on an Amazon EC2 instance with an instance profile that has access to the Amazon SES service.
